entry.title: Russia Tries to Tighten Hold Over Occupied Areas of Ukraine
entry.content: As its military campaign to take more territory in the eastern Donbas region stalls in the face of fierce resistance, Moscow is attempting to hold on to areas it occupies already, with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky warning that fighting is set to intensify.

entry.title: Egypt's Bread Crisis Awakens Old Fears of Political Unrest
entry.content: The world’s top wheat importer faces strains to its subsidized food program in wake of Russian invasion of Ukraine as shortages, rising prices hit budget. When baladi supplies ran out, “you should have seen the fight.”
